Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

The agents of the projected regency of Senhora Januária, hand in hand with the fallen party and the elected President, have set civil war aflame in this Province; and wishing the Provincial Assembly to impose on Your Excellency Dr. Marciano Pereira Ribeiro for this purpose. However, as we prepare to undertake this arduous but necessary mission, my friend Senhor Pe. Manuel Francisco de Andrade, moved by patriotism and sincere friendship for Your Excellency

The respect and pure friendship that I have long consecrated to Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Porto Alegre, March 11, 1836.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Diogo Antonio Feijó — Regent of the Empire.

On leaf 1r. of the document.
